Class Account

java.lang.Object
Account
public class Account extends Object
Author: Darren, Min Xuan, Monika, Teren, Jana, Amanda, Kirby E-mail: - Date: 20240219 Description: The Account class represents a basic financial account with deposit, withdrawal, and balance operations, as well as transfer operations to other accounts.
